easy.q: I have keys but no locks. I have space but no room. You can enter, but you can't go outside. What am I?
easy.hint: Think about computer or piano keys.

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?
medium.hint: Consider how adding letters changes meaning.

hard.q: A box contains 3 red balls and 2 blue balls. Without looking, I pick one ball. If I pick a blue ball, I win nothing; if I pick a red ball, I win twice my age. What is the minimum age to make this a favorable bet?
hard.hint: Compare expected value to zero: (2*R/Total) > (B/Total). Use R=3, B=2.
